intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to SmartwaveUK ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and process your personal data when you use our website and services.

infoCollect.title: 2. Information We Collect
infoCollect.content: We collect personal information that you provide to us voluntarily when you register, make a purchase, or contact us. This may include:

list.item1: Name, email address, phone number, and postal address.

howUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howUse.content: We use your personal information to:

list.item2: Communicate with you regarding your account or orders.
list.item3: Improve our website and customer service.
list.item4: Send you marketing communications (if you have opted in).

sharing.title: 4. Sharing Your Information
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your data with trusted third-party service providers (such as payment processors and shipping couriers) solely for the purpose of fulfilling our services to you.

contact.title: 5. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@smartwaveuk.com.

freeNextDay.title: Free Next Day Delivery
freeNextDay.description: On all UK orders over £200 placed before 2 PM.

insured.title: Insured Shipping
insured.description: All packages are fully insured against loss or damage.

domestic.title: Domestic Shipping (UK)
domestic.content: We use reliable couriers like Royal Mail and DPD for all domestic shipments.
domestic.nextDayDesc: £5.99 (Free on orders over £200). Order by 2 PM Mon-Fri.

international.title: International Shipping
international.content: We ship to select international destinations. Shipping costs and times vary by location and will be calculated at checkout. Please note that international customers are responsible for any customs duties or import taxes.

processing.title: Order Processing
processing.content: Orders placed before 2 PM GMT on business days are typically processed and dispatched the same day. Orders placed after this time or on weekends/holidays will be dispatched the next business day.

returns.title: Returns Policy
returns.content: We want you to be completely happy with your purchase. If you are not satisfied, you can return items within 14 days of receipt for a refund or exchange, provided they are in their original condition and packaging.
returns.contact: To initiate a return, please contact our support team with your order number.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using the SmartwaveUK website, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

products.title: 2. Products and Services
products.content: We strive to display our products as accurately as possible. However, we do not warrant that product descriptions, images, or other content on the site are accurate, complete, reliable, current, or error-free. All products are subject to availability.

pricing.title: 3. Pricing and Payments
pricing.content: All prices are listed in the currency displayed at checkout. We reserve the right to change prices at any time without notice. Payments must be received in full before orders are dispatched.

returns.title: 4. Returns and Refunds
returns.content: We offer a return policy for defective or unsatisfactory items within the timeframe specified in our Shipping & Returns policy. Items must be returned in their original condition.

liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: SmartwaveUK shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with the use of our website or products.

changes.title: 6. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Your continued use of the website following any changes indicates your acceptance of the new terms.
